scripts.test: npm run unit_test && npm run integration_test
scripts.unit_test: cd src/tests/ && env TS_NODE_COMPILER_OPTIONS='{"module": "commonjs" }' mocha -r ts-node/register './unit/**/*.ts'
scripts.integration_test: cd src/tests/ && env TS_NODE_COMPILER_OPTIONS='{"module": "commonjs" }' mocha -r ts-node/register './integration/**/*.ts'
scripts.unit_test_with_setup: npm run setup_test && npm run unit_test && npm run teardown_test
scripts.integration_test_with_setup: npm run setup_test && npm run integration_test && npm run teardown_test
